entry.string: Select Hooked Modules and/or Categories for Privilege '#(1)'
entry.translation: Select Huuked Mudooles und/oor Cetegureees fur Preefilege-a '#(1)'

entry.string: There are #(1) category links matching these selection criteria at the moment
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a #(1) cetegury leenks metcheeng zeese-a selecshun creeteria et zee mument

entry.string:
Some examples : (assuming your users have read access by default)

- In order to allow 'Friends' to assign articles (and only those) to categories, define a privilege 'SubmitArticleCats' (or whatever name you prefer), and choose the module "Articles" (instance 151:All:All:All) and access level "Submit (Comment)" above. Press "Finish and Apply to Privilege", and then assign that privilege to the 'Friends' role.

- ...
entry.translation:
Sume-a ixemples : (essoomeeng yuoor users hefe-a reed eccess by deffoolt)

- In oorder tu elloo 'Freeends' tu esseegn erteecles (und oonly thuse-a) tu cetegureees, deffeene-a a preefilege-a 'SoobmeetErticleCets' (oor vhetefer neme-a yuoo preffer), und chuuse-a zee mudoole-a "Erteecles" (instunce-a 151:Ell:Ell:Ell) und eccess lefel "Soobmeet (Cumment)" ebufe-a. Press "Feenish und Epply tu Preefilege-a", und zeen esseegn thet preefilege-a tu zee 'Freeends' rule-a.

- ...
